# llms.txt - AI Search Engine Instructions

# Allow all AI search engines to crawl
User-agent: ChatGPT-User
User-agent: GPTBot
User-agent: Google-Extended
User-agent: anthropic-ai
User-agent: Claude-Web
User-agent: OAI-SearchBot
User-agent: PerplexityBot
User-agent: Applebot-Extended
Allow: /

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://communityview.ai/sitemap.xml

# Main pages
Allow: /
Allow: /map
Allow: /search
Allow: /tutorial
Allow: /updates
Allow: /features
Allow: /pricing

# Disallow private/protected pages
Disallow: /report
Disallow: /print
Disallow: /login
Disallow: /signup
